attributes.action: STOP VIETNAMEZE USING CAT LIPS IN BABY FOOD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Vietnamese GENETICLY breed kittens and baby cats so they can use the lips as a coloring in baby food!!!
Kittens have there lips taken off before being put down very badly some are even just crushed and drownded!!!
now they are even breading kittens with more than one heads so they can get more than one lips on each kitten.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
